src:
Cedera Horor di Laga Everton vs Tottenham: Son Menangis, Pochettino Minta Maaf
04 Nov 2019, 04:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah insiden yang mengerikan terjadi dalam laga lanjutan Premier League antara Tottenham melawan Everton, Minggu (3/11/2019) lalu. Pemain Everton, Andre Gomes, harus ditarik dari lapangan karena mengalami cedera horor.
Berlangsung di Goodison Park, insiden horor tersebut terjadi saat laga telah berjalan selama 77 menit. Saat itu, Tottenham dalam situasi unggul berkat gol Dele Alli di awal babak kedua.
Kejadiannya diawali oleh Andre Gomes yang sedang berlari untuk melancarkan serangan ke pertahanan Tottenham. Di saat yang sama, Son Heung-Min sedang mengejarnya untuk merebut bola sekaligus menghentikan serangan Everton.
Dari belakang, pemain asal Korea Selatan tersebut hendak mengambil bola dari kaki Andre Gomes. Sayangnya, penempatan waktunya kurang tepat hingga membuat Andre Gomes terjatuh dan mengerang kesakitan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Horror Injury in the Everton vs Tottenham match: Son Cries, Pochettino Apologizes
Nov 04 2019, 04:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A terrible incident occurred in the Premier League continued match between Tottenham against Everton on Sunday (3/11/2019) then. Everton's Andre Gomes has to be withdrawn from the field due to a horror injury.
Taking place at Goodison Park, the horror incident occurred when the game had been running for 77 minutes. At that time, Tottenham were in a superior situation thanks to a Dele Alli goal early in the second half.
The incident began with Andre Gomes who was running to launch an attack at Tottenham's defense. At the same time, Son Heung-Min was chasing after him to grab the ball and stop Everton's attack.
From behind, the South Korean player was about to take the ball from the feet of Andre Gomes. Unfortunately, the timing was not right enough to make Andre Gomes fall and groan in pain.

Scroll down to read full information.
